about_the_game:
Vector Wave is a chaotic retro-themed party game strongly focused on physics-based action. In Vector Wave where health does not exist, you must scavenge for weapons in the arena, blast your opponents out of bounds and be the last one left standing!

ONLINE AND LOCAL MULTIPLAYER

Jump into Vector Wave with friends, a game that supports 2-4 player online and local multiplayer! Battle against friends by organising a chaotic free-for-all, or test your cooperative skills by teaming up!

UNIQUE WEAPONS

With access to 35+ weapons in Vector Wave, there will always be something perfect for you to knock your opponents away! Each weapon has its own unique feel, ranging from a throwable rock perfect for disarming your enemies to a rare but intimidating launcher harnessing the power of a black hole!



Don't want guns? Explode your way to victory with unique grenades like impacts, frags and clusters! Or maybe control the arena by rigging the map with automated turrets, life-ending landmines and... skateboarding ducks?

CUSTOMISE YOUR EXPERIENCE

Do you like self-expression and the latest square-based fashion trends? We've you covered! Choose 1 of 8 neon colours to determine your look and team, and customize your square with 50+ unlockable hats to flaunt and impress your friends! Playing games and winning rounds will net you some shiny Vector Tokens to spend in the hat shop.

When the dust settles, only one square can be left standing...
